ThingDef.label: boater hat
ThingDef.description: A fashionable hat to ward off the sun in summer, gives off a warm and breezy style. Improves social impact.

ThingDef.label: boater hat
ThingDef.description: A fashionable hat to ward off the sun in summer, gives off a warm and breezy style. Improves social impact.

ThingDef.label: bowler hat
ThingDef.description: A stylish hat which gives off a slightly formal, business style. Improves social impact.

ThingDef.label: fedora
ThingDef.description: A dignifed hat which gives off a sleek and formal style, often worn by pirates and mob bosses for its attitude. Improves social impact.

ThingDef.label: newsboy cap
ThingDef.description: A plain cap which gives off an urban look. Improves social impact.

ThingDef.label: top hat
ThingDef.description: An elegant hat which gives the wearer a sophisticated look of importance. Improves social impact.

ThingDef.label: feathered top hat
ThingDef.description: A striking feathered hat that has an air of grandeur. Improves social impact.

ThingDef.label: steamer top hat
ThingDef.description: A dashing eccentric hat fit for any stylish engineer or insane inventor.

ThingDef.label: pith helmet
ThingDef.description: A military helmet that protects its wearer from the sun while out in the field.

ThingDef.label: pith helmet
ThingDef.description: A military helmet that protects its wearer from the sun while out in the field.

ThingDef.label: kepi
ThingDef.description: A military cap that protects the user from the sun while out in the field.

ThingDef.label: kepi
ThingDef.description: A military cap that protects the user from the sun while out in the field. This particular one protects the user's neck.

ThingDef.Name: PilotCap
ThingDef.label: pilot cap
ThingDef.description: A charming leather cap and goggles usually donned by pilots to shield their eyes from the wind.

ThingDef.Name: AviatorGoggles
ThingDef.label: goggles
ThingDef.description: A pair of goggles often donned by pilots and drifters to shield their eyes from wind and sand alike.

ThingDef.Name: SteamGoggles
ThingDef.label: goggles
ThingDef.description: A pair of goggles, often worn by engineers and mechanics to protect their eyes while working. Also provides a small amount of protection from toxic fallout.

ThingDef.label: magnifying goggles
ThingDef.description: A pair of industrial goggles to protect the eyes, often seen on engineers and eccentric inventors. This pair has an extra set of magnifying lenses great for more precise work.

ThingDef.label: spectacles
ThingDef.description: A pair of eyeglasses that make the user look slightly smarter. Can also improves vision.

ThingDef.label: Tinkercraft Chefhat
ThingDef.description: Armed with timers and very basic scent-detector helps anyone cook the meals just right. The chef hat on it is just for declaring the purpose of this headgear

ThingDef.label: Chef's hat
ThingDef.description: These iconic chef hats do serve an actual purpose - Keeping the hair in check. Finding hair in your soup often means dissatisfied customer.

ThingDef.label: Fedora
ThingDef.description: These hats are often associated with gangsters and government officials, which are both practically the same.

ThingDef.label: tricorne
ThingDef.description: A seafaring hat primarily, they are comfortable to wear but out of style.

ThingDef.label: hood
ThingDef.description: The kind of headwear you see worn by shady characters in dark alleys.

ThingDef.label: hood and mask
ThingDef.description: The kind of headwear you see worn by shady characters in dark alleys.

ThingDef.label: Scarf
ThingDef.description: A scarf that provides small resistance against toxic fallout.

ThingDef.label: Bandit scarf
ThingDef.description: Robbing a stagecoach has never been as much fun without wearing a scarf on your face. Scarves provide small resistance against toxic fallout.

ThingDef.label: engineer's cap
ThingDef.description: A cap often worn by engineers and mechanics.

ThingDef.label: steamhull helmet
ThingDef.description: A part of an armor set, mostly used by heavy infantry. Protects against toxic fallout.
